description:
Season: 19
Original Air Date: 03/29/2006

Eric at first feels horrible that Stephanie did this to Felicia against her will but then is touched by Felicia’s presence and hopes that everything will work out for the best. Brooke and Nick admit their love for one another and discuss their future together. Later, Brooke sees Ridge who tries to convince her to be with him instead of Nick.
